trans-unit.source: Abstract class that describes a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] drawing.
trans-unit.target: Classe abstrata que descreve um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] desenho.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited by your code.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada por seu código.

trans-unit.source: Drawing objects are light-weight objects that enable you to add geometric shapes, images, text, and media to an application.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos de desenho são objetos de leve que permitem adicionar formas geométricas, imagens, texto e mídia para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Drawing objects are considered light-weight because they do not provide support for [Layout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and focus.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos de desenho são considerados leve porque eles não oferecem suporte para [Layout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [visão geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)e o foco.

trans-unit.source: Because of their performance benefits, drawings are ideal for backgrounds and clip art.
trans-unit.target: Devido a seus benefícios de desempenho, desenhos são ideais para planos de fundo e clip-art.

trans-unit.source: You also use drawings when programming at the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> level.
trans-unit.target: Você também usar desenhos ao programar no <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>nível.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: Because they inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, Drawing objects provide additional features that make them useful for describing clip art and backgrounds: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: Porque eles herdam a <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>classe, os objetos de desenho fornecem recursos adicionais que os tornam úteis para descrever clip-art e planos de fundo: pode ser declarados como, compartilhados entre vários objetos, somente leitura e tornados thread-safe.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os diferentes recursos fornecidos pelo <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos, consulte o [visão geral de objetos Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: There are different types of Drawing objects for different types of content: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>.
trans-unit.target: Há tipos diferentes de objetos de desenho para diferentes tipos de conteúdo: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>e <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing> </xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features A Drawing is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: Desenho de um Freezable recursos é um tipo de <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](../Topic/Freezable%20Objects%20Overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>recursos, como congelamento e clonagem, consulte o [visão geral de objetos Freezable](../Topic/Freezable%20Objects%20Overview.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the axis-aligned bounds of the drawing's contents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os limites de alinhado por eixo do conteúdo do desenho.

trans-unit.source: The axis-aligned bounds of the drawing's contents.
trans-unit.target: Os limites alinhado por eixo do conteúdo do desenho.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"> </xref>, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores do objeto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Ao copiar as propriedades de dependência, esse método copia associações de dados e as referências de recurso (mas eles não podem resolver) mas não animações ou seus valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade será <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> era de propriedade<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Cria um clone modificável <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"> </xref> objeto, fazendo cópias profundas dos valores atuais deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Referências de recurso, associações de dados e animações não são copiadas, mas são os valores atuais.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para produzir cópias modificáveis de congelada <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objetos (ou qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objeto).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Para sua conveniência, este método sombreia a versão herdada com uma implementação fortemente tipada.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Um clone modificável do objeto atual.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto clonado <> </> *> propriedade será <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> mesmo se a fonte <> </> *> propriedade <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
